title: Collaborative Learning Design for Pharmacology Infographics

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary pharmacology concepts and understanding of drug action mechanisms
context.additional_context: Group collaborative learning in a microlearning environment using digital devices. Conducting two infographic creation and evaluation sessions at 2-week intervals

learning_goals: Systematically structure pharmacology knowledge and visualize it through infographics
Exchange peer feedback during collaborative learning to improve information comprehension by over 70%
Integrate drug mechanism of action and clinical application cases into infographics for explanation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
